rules_text:
Flying, haste
Whenever you attack, if Bootstrap Daemon is in your graveyard, you may pay {R} and sacrifice two artifacts and/or enchantments. If you do, return it to the battlefield tapped and attacking.

Whenever this creature attacks, you may sacrifice four artifacts and/or enchantments. If you do, take an extra turn after this one. You lose the game at the beginning of the next opponent’s upkeep.
